alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:46PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Oneida, Broome, Madison, eastern Cortland, southeastern Tioga, southeastern Onondaga and Chenango Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Galeville to near Apalachin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Rome, Vestal, Sullivan, Johnson City, Endicott, Oneida, Lenox, Pompey and Verona. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 33 and 34. New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 9. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 66 and 80. Interstate 88 between 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida; Tioga
